channel.title: Where can I get the Radix logo and brand guidelines?
channel.description:
The Radix logo in various formats and brand guidelines can be downloaded from below:
[Radix-Logo-Pack.zip|attachment](upload://b1XNwZoTdEqPnG382BeYUtKReqZ.zip) (23.9 KB) [Brand-Guidelines.pdf|attachment](upload://xMLiIhEWPCLOHn4AfGWibRx8Q8K.pdf) (3.7 MB) [Radix_Logo.eps.zip|attachment](upload://wBAVwfqXsFhvOidwxpyug3gWIok.zip) (367.2 KB) [Radix_Logo.ai.zip|attachment](upload://6DxBD1oaRVKGmd1nXpLUsQ1UQKY.zip) (313.6 KB)
*From **welcome** channel in [RadixDLT Discord Forum](https://discord.com/channels/417762285172555786/767502895888334879/823227798356754442)*
